A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
HEAVY SPOILER ALERT:






Overall this movie was underwhelming.

Rays training with Luke - Lots of build up with little pay off

Princess + Force = Eh wasn't feel it... 

Barely any saber battles and force using...

Snoke : This mysterious powerful figure introduce finally but then gone so fast????  Obviously feeling like that may not be true in the next movie but not enough character development with him ...

Captain Phasma: Another central figure\, well introduced but let go so soon...
Luke: They could have done SO much more with him... Everyone wants to see his strength and skills... we saw that in 1 scene for about 2 minutes... then he disappears... COME ON... 3 main characters. HUGE characters... gone... granted he will probably come back the same as a "you know who did" next film but major downer for me... so much build up again little pay off...

Ray is suppose to be the next thing? She has impressive strength and instinct but she is still a beginner... Her saber training was the extent of the trailer... The torch is passed but the flame isn't lit...

I wish these weren't my thoughts... let down...
